altTitles.ja: 酩酊の女傭兵ベル。

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê hệ cồn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en:
A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
___
**Note**: Chapters “6.7” and “9.10” are Chapters 6 & 7 and 9 & 10 respectively. Chapters 6 and 9 are textless (and therefore have nothing to translate), so they've been put together with the successive chapter to comply with MangaDex rules.

title.en: Yuuryou Bukken Mou Dame Sou - Furo, Toilet to Tenshi wa Kyoudou desu

altTitles.ja: 優良物件もうダメ荘~風呂､トイレと天使は共同です~

altTitles.en: Excellent Property: This Dormitory Is Full of Losers  ~Communal Toilets and Angels~

description.en: A story about a 70-year-old super cheap apartment named "Damesou" near the coast of a rural village with a communal bathroom, washstand, kitchen, and toilets, and the losers taking residence here!

altTitles.ja: とある魔術の禁書目録

description.ar:
تدور أحداث القصة في عالم حيث توجد قوى خارقة للطبيعة من العلم، ويوجد السحر من الدين  
  
في القصة، توما كاميجو هو طالب عادي في الثانوية بدرجات دراسية فظيعة وقوة تسمى كاسرة الأوهام. يمكن لـ كاسرة الأوهام إبطال أي قوة أخرى، لكنها تقوض أيضًا حظ كاميجو الجيد.   
.إن قوة كاسرة الأوهام الهائلة لا تُوصف حرفياً، لذا فإن كاميجو المسكين مصنّف في المستوى من ذوي المستوى صفر  
يصادف أنه قابل فتاة برداء أبيض تتدلى من شرفة نافذته. تقول الفتاة أن السَّحرةَ يطاردونها، ويكتشف كاميجو أن الفتاة هي راهبة في كنيسة إنجلترا التي استبدلت ذكرياتها بالقُوَّةِ ليتصبح "فهرس الكتُب المحرّمة" الـ .103,000 للكنيسة
description.en:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
description.ru:
Действие разворачивается в параллельном мире, где наука сплавлена с магией, и сверхъестественные способности давно никого не удивляют. Их носители делятся на две категории: эсперов, которые в результате направленной мутации получили один, пусть и мощный дар, и магов, которые могут быть слабее, но диапазон возможностей у них куда шире. Юных эсперов со всей Японии собирают в единый образовательный центр – город под названием Академия. Там и учится главный герой сериала Камидзё Тома. Дар у парня весьма странный: его правая рука – универсальный негатор, то есть, обнуляет любое парафизическое, магическое или божественное воздействие. А раз так, считает Тома, то и немногие крупицы счастья, посылаемые судьбой, до него просто не доходят, и вся его жизнь – полная невезуха (его любимая фраза). То на телефон наступит, то не с теми парнями свяжется, то обнаружит на перилах собственного балкона на редкость милое и голодное юное создание в костюме монашки…  
  
Адаптация ранобэ Toaru Majutsu no Index от Камати Кадзумы.|
description.pt-br: A história se passa em uma cidade acadêmica tecnologicamente avançada localizada na região oeste de Tóquio, onde alunos cientificamente avançados chamados "espers" estudam e desenvolvem habilidades especiais cuja fonte é a mente humana. Touma Kamijou é um estudante da Academia da Cidade cuja habilidade, a Imagine Breaker, possui o poder de anular quaisquer outros poderes usando sua mão direita, mas esse poder faz com que sua sorte também seja anulada, fazendo com que seja alvo de diversas furadas e problemas de azar. Um dia ele encontra uma jovem pendurada na grade de sua varanda...

altTitles.pt-br: Um hóspede não convidado do Paraíso

description.pt-br:
O mundo está dividido em três zonas. A Ilha do Céu, a terra e o submundo, ‘Proserpina’.
‘Miobe’, que mora em Proserpina, sonha com o dia em que poderá ir para Sky Island com seu primeiro amor, ‘Haluk’.
Porém, na noite em que Miobe estava dormindo, uma revolução que ocorreu no submundo mudou o destino de Haluk e Miobe…!

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: まじっく快斗

altTitles.th: จอมโจรอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

altTitles.ja: タルタロス劇場ワイルド

description.en: Collection of 4-komas centered around Persona 3, 4, 5 and their various spinoff games.

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

title.en: I Saw the Future With the Killer Grand Duke

description.en: Today, I am getting married for the second time to my husband, as the daughter of the imperial family he hates. Pretending to be good, pretending to be weak, pretending to be poor. I possessed Gabriella Nashert, a villainess who possesses the ‘three-piece combo’ that enrages the readers. In order to escape her scheduled death, she asked Ernst Esqes, the Northern Grand Duke, to marry her on a contract. The three years spent with her husband, away from where the original incident took place, were quite sweet. Even though it ended with my death. "If you and I meet in our next life, please marry me again." However, when I woke up again, I found out that I became the daughter of the family who’s responsible for my death?

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei Apocrypha: War of the Dove

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei Gaiten - Hato no Senki

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生外典 鳩の戦記

description.en: A standalone story set in the larger Megami Tensei universe. Our hero Hato is just an ordinary schoolboy, until one day he receives a ~~Command Spell~~ Stigma on his left hand, forges a contract with ~~Lancer~~ Cu Chulainn to become his master, and is unwittingly dragged into a city-wide Holy ~~Grail~~ War.

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (Noon) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

altTitles.ja: キミと以心伝心っ！

description.en: High school student Saika has psychic abilities, and as such he is constantly tormented by people's thoughts. However, after he makes a friend – who happens to be in love with him – he finds it's not all that bad.

altTitles.es: ¡La Pandilla del Amor Puro de Shonan!

altTitles.th: คู่คนลุยเลอะ!

altTitles.ja: しょうなん じゅんあいぐみ!
湘南純愛組!

description.en: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.
description.pt: Antes de Eikichi Onizuka se tornar "Great Teacher Onizuka", ele e Ryuji Danma eram membros da infame gangue de motoqueiros, OniBaku. Quando eles não saem andando por aí se metendo em confusões, esta dupla pode ser encontrada na escola, tentando pegar garotas, claro. Essa é a história de como surgiu a lenda do OniBaku e como era a vida de Onizuka e Ryuji em seu tempo de colegiais.

title.en: Nanashi - Nakushita Nani ka no Sagashikata

altTitles.ja: ナナシ ～ナくしたナにかのさがシかた～

description.en: The manga will adapt Harumi Fujino's "Nanashi Series" online occult horror stories. The stories center on the protagonist Haru (a pseudonym for the author), and his friend Kyousuke "Nanashi" Nanashima, who possesses strange powers.
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.Author's Twitter : [@cacomistle_tail](https://twitter.com/cacomistle_tail)

title.en: Love Live! School Idol Festival All Stars Event Memory

altTitles.ja: ラブライブ！スクールアイドルフェスティバルALL STARS イベントメモリー

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье по делам Джека Потрошителя
Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

description.en: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Double Seven-hen

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Daburu Sebun-hen

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Double Seven Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Близняшки Саэгуса

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 ダブルセブン編

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法科高校的劣等生：雙七篇

altTitles.zh: 魔法科高校的劣等生：双七篇

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō-sei Double Seven-hen

description.en:
The second year has started! Mikihiko has been promoted to Course 1, Tatsuya has entered the new Magical Engineering Course, and trouble is brewing between Saegusa Mayumi's younger twin sisters and 1st year representative Shippou Takuma, a member of the 18 Assistant Houses' Shippou Household.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 12.

altTitles.ja: 放課後のシンデレラくん

description.en:
It's a romantic comedy about the overbearing love between a popular, outgoing boy and a girl who is actually a cross-dressing boy!

---
**Notes:**
- Serialized as [Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni](https://mangadex.org/title/52e2bba3-1948-4e65-a282-a73a0b036005/inaho-kun-wa-nise-kanojo-no-hazu-na-no-ni).

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: Tsuihou Bokensha no Yarinaoshi ~Yousei-kai de Kitae Naoshite Jibun no Ibasho wo Tsukuru~

altTitles.ja: 追放冒険者のやりなおし　～妖精界で鍛えなおして自分の居場所をつくる～
Tsuihou Bokensha no Yarinaoshi ~Yousei-kai de Kitae Naoshite Jibun no Ibasho wo Tsukuru~

altTitles.en: Outcast Adventurer's Second Chance ~Training in the Fairy World to Forge a Place to Belong~

description.en: "Glen, your bad reputation is dragging the party down. We're kicking you out today." A party of adventurers formed from childhood friends. The day after a promotion exam, Glen was summoned to the guild and expelled by the party leader. The reason given was the "bad rumours" that followed Glen. The rumours had no basis, but Glen was already considering leaving the party, so he accepted the outcome and left the party. Alone, he returned to his hometown for the first time in a long while to catch up. "Glen, leave this place." What awaited him there were the people who raised him believing in the bad rumours. "If you think I'm like that, then I'll be like that" he shouted as he disappeared into the forest. This is a story about an adventurer trying to regain the things he has lost. Those who abandoned him will wallow in grief, while he moves forward with his new companions.

altTitles.ja: 救世主の生き残り

description.en:
In order to stop the invasion of the demons and seal the evil god which has been resurrected after a thousand years, Grey embarks on a journey together with his sister, Fiona, and his comrades. 

At the end of their journey, they were facing the evil god, and all of his comrades including his little sister were killed because of the evil god.

 

Being the only survivor of the journey, Grey was hailed as a hero and was granted the throne as the emperor of the holy empire, gaining glory and authority. 

 

Unfortunately, Grey couldn’t recover from the grief of losing his one and only sister, and decided to use any means necessary to revive her. After countless attempts to try and revive his sister, Grey became hopeless, until he heard a mysterious voice saying,

 

 [Do you want to save the most precious person in your life?]

 

[If you’re willing to sacrifice everything, I will show you the way.]

 

After making a deal with the mysterious voice,

Grey found himself standing in his hometown that was supposed to be destroyed by the invasion of the demons…

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

title.en: The Sea Painted by the Moonlight

description.en:
Naranda is a country where mermaids are said to have lived in the sea once upon a time.
Yeonji joins the Naranda Historical Research Institute as an intern to prove it.
She has been dreaming of a mermaid since she was a child.
At the institute, she meets her team leader, Hae-rang, who looks like the mermaid from her dreams.
She tries her best to impress Hae-rang, but she's not impressed with her...

The mystery of her past life, sinking to the bottom of the sea with the kingdom of Naranda begins to unfold!
description.ko:
옛날옛적 바닷 속에 인어가 살았다고 전해지는 나라 '나란다'
그걸 증명하기 위해 연구하는 '나란다 역사 연구소'의 인턴으로 들어간 "연지"
어릴 때부터 계속 인어 꿈을 꾸는 그녀는 연구소에서 자신의 꿈에 나온 인어와 닮은 팀장 "해랑"을 만나게 된다.
해랑에게 잘보이고 싶은 연지는 열심히 노력해보지만 해랑은 쌀쌀맞기만 한데...

나란다 왕국과 함께 바닷속에 가라앉은 전생의 비밀이 풀리기 시작한다!

altTitles.ja: 東京ネオンスキャンダル

description.en:
The magazine contains people "secrets".

Hayama, a new employee is assigned to the weekly scandal editorial department.

It is a weekly photo magazine that publishes extreme stories about everything, from celebrity infidelity to behind-the-scenes crimes, and is derided as "trash" by some people.

As soon as he is assigned to the magazine, Hayama is paired up with a female photographer and heads for Roppongi without knowing why.

What awaits him there is a ridiculous secret junkie who masturbates to the repercussions of her scoops....
description.pt-br: Yuu Hayama é um garoto que sempre sonhou em ser um super herói, e tenta conseguir um emprego que seja de acordo com seu sonho, porém, a revista que ele consegue começar a trabalhar não é nada como ele esperava. E tudo se torna pior quando ele conhece a sensual e perigosa, Kurobane Sayuri, também chamada de "O Ás da Câmera". As experiências que ele irá passar ao lado dela, farão que seu senso de justiça aos poucos seja modificado...

altTitles.ja: 最高のヒモ拾いました

altTitles.zh-hk: 我撿到了個極品軟飯男

altTitles.zh: 我捡到了个极品软饭男

description.en: When Aoi Kurosaki, a working girl, wakes up in the morning, she finds a handsome stranger preparing breakfast for her. She wakes up with a hangover and tries to remember, but she has no idea where she is. This handsome guy looks familiar to her...

altTitles.ja: 災い狐のくずれちゃん
となりのメタラーさん

description.en:
About to freeze to death on a day of heavy snow, Kento is saved by his neighbor Soushi. Dressed all in black, taciturn and scary-looking, Soushi seems hard to approach, but his eyes, almost hidden by his long hair, shine as if pleading for something. After that day, the two of them end up eating together every day for one year. Kento, while hiding the fact that he's gay, doesn't want the peaceful and happy time they share to come to an end. Can he keep a lid on his feelings…?!  

  
This is the story before I welcome the second spring after my encounter with Soushi-san…  
  
Kento, a poor graduate student, is about to be frozen to death on a heavy snowfall day, when he is rescued by his neighbor, Soushi. Soushi might be dressed in all-black, is taciturn, has a fierce gaze, and is hard to approach, but his eyes hidden behind his long hair sway, like he longs to say something. It's been a year since they've been sharing meals together. Kento fears that his days of happiness will come to an end, which is why he hides the fact that he's gay from him.  
But, in the end, will he able to continue to live like this while shutting out his ever growing feelings…?

altTitles.ja: PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～
ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり

altTitles.ja-ro: Pick Me up!! Tei Rea Eiyū No Nariagari

description.en:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
description.pt-br:
No jogo de gacha mobile famoso por sua extrema dificuldade, o Mestre classificado em 5º lugar no mundo, "Loki" perde a consciência ao invadir a Masmorra.

"O quê? Eu sou um personagem de jogo agora?"

Depois de acordar, "Loki" percebe que ele se transformou em um Herói de Nível 1, 1 Estrela – 'Han Yslat'. Para retornar à Terra, ele deve liderar o Mestre e os heróis novatos e limpar o 100º andar da Masmorra!

"Você mexeu com o cara errado".

Esta é a história de transporte mais difícil  pelo Mestre Loki que nunca aceita uma única derrota.

title.en: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!

altTitles.ja: 現実(リアル)もたまには嘘をつく
現実もたまには嘘をつく
ゲーム好きの友達と色々する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Gemuzuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl

altTitles.uk: Іноді навіть реальність може бути оманливою

altTitles.hi: कभी कभी सच भी झूठ होता है!

altTitles.zh: 和喜欢游戏的朋友各种轶事

altTitles.zh-hk: 和喜歡游戲的朋友各種軼事

altTitles.vi: Đi chơi cùng nữ game thủ
Hẹn hò cùng nữ game thủ

description.en: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
description.fr: Terazaki Kaoru est sur le point de rencontrer son ami en ligne, Nanami. Mais Nanami ne sait pas que Terazaki est en réalité un homme dans la vie réelle! Il sera certainement déçu et dégouté. Mais Terazaki va lui avoir aussi une surprise…
description.id:
Terazaki Kaoru akan bertemu dengan salah satu teman dari Game Online yang dia mainkan bernama Nanami. Namun, Nanami hanya tahu kalau Kaoru di dalam Game adalah karakter perempuan imut yang bernama Kaori, tapi dia tidak tahu kalau Kaoru di dunia nyata sebenarnya adalah seorang laki-laki.

Saat bertemu dengannya nanti, Nanami pasti akan kecewa dan merasa sedikit aneh, namun… Ketika bertemu, Kaoru pun sontak ikut terkejut. Karena Nanami ternyata…
description.it: Terazaki Kaoru sta per incontrare il suo amico di internet, Nanami. Ma Nanami non sa che Terazaki è un ragazzo nella realta! Con questo Nanami Potrebbe rimanerci delusa o forse trovarlo strano (considerando che l' avatar di Kaoru è femminile), ma ciò che il ragazzo non sa, è che riceverà una sorpresa a sua volta…
description.ja:
友達以上、恋人未満のふたりが繰り広げるハイテンションラブコメディ!

ゲーム好きな男の子、薫はネットゲームで知り合った男性と駅で待ち合わせ。女性キャラを使っていたせいで女の子だと勘違いされていることを心配する薫だが、待ち合わせ場所にやってきたのはかわいい女の子で……?
description.pt: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…
description.ru:
Заядлый геймер Каору Тэрадзаки собирается встретиться с подругой Нанами, с которой познакомился в онлайн-игре. До этого они не виделись в реальной жизни, так что Нанами не знает, что, хотя в игре Тэрадзаки использовал женского персонажа, в реальной жизни он — парень. Каору убеждён, что Нанами наверняка будет разочарована этим фактом, но его ждёт сюрприз...

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/124209-real-mo-tama-ni-wa-uso-wo-tsuku))
description.uk: Каору Теразакі — геймер, котрий захоплюється MMORPG, там він знайшов друга, з котрим товаришував протягом досить тривалого проміжку часу. І ось настав час зустрітися з ним особисто – поза межами онлайн. Та все не так просто, як здавалося на перший погляд, так як Каору грав під дівочим аватаром, його товариш вважає, що той – дівчина. Каору знаходиться у тривожному передчутті, що як його друг буде розчарований? Ба більше, на нього також чекав сюрприз – замість іншого хлопця, його другом виявляється симпатична дівчина – Нанамі Осака. До того ж, Нанамі заздалегідь попередила батьків, що приведе з собою друга – подругу. Ситуація ускладняється тим, що у Нанамі занадто турботливий тато, котрий віддубасить кожного хлопця, котрий посміє наблизитися до його доньки. Ця дилема має лише одне рішення: Каору треба переодягтися в дівчину! Чи окупляться зрештою зусилля Каору?! Чи залишаться Каору та Нанамі просто друзями, чи час, який вони провели у реальному житті разом, все змінить? Слідкуйте за їхніми романтичними пригодами, щоб дізнатися!
description.pt-br: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…

description.en:
Good for nothing Yoo Hobin is always bullied by students who feel superior to him, yet he ignores them as his life is all too difficult already. However, an unintentional incident ends up turning his life around. He becomes famous through a viral video that he didn't even intend to upload! Everything is perfect! He instantly becomes famous and starts earning money from the accidental video he uploaded.  
  
But since it was unintentional, he is unable to reproduce it. Fueled by the potential money to be made and his sudden surge of popularity, he plans to make more captivating videos that people will find interesting and help him gather more subscribers… However, he cannot accomplish any of that unless he learns HOW TO FIGHT.
description.fr: Bon à rien, Yoo Hobin est toujours intimidé par des étudiants qui se sentent supérieurs à lui, mais il les ignore car sa vie est déjà trop difficile. Cependant, un incident involontaire finit par bouleverser sa vie. Il devient célèbre grâce à une vidéo virale qu'il n'avait même pas l'intention de mettre en ligne ! Tout est parfait ! Il devient instantanément célèbre et commence à gagner de l'argent grâce à la vidéo accidentelle qu'il a mise en ligne. Mais comme elle n'était pas intentionnelle, il est incapable de la reproduire. Alimenté par l'argent potentiel à gagner et le changement soudain de popularité, il prévoit alors de réaliser des vidéos plus captivantes que les gens trouveront intéressantes et qui l'aideront à rassembler plus d'abonnés… Cependant, il ne peut rien faire de tout cela à moins de savoir " COMMENT SE BATTRE ".
description.pt-br: Hobin, um estudante intimidado, sem querer surgiu com um novo canal no NewTube. A partir desse momento, sua vida mudou. Como ele irá aprender a lutar e fazer um bom conteúdo? Como ele administrará a mudança essa em sua vida e até onde essa mudança vai? Ação, Drama, Comédia, e com um toque de Romance!

altTitles.ja: 妄想先生

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...

title.en: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

altTitles.en: The Story of Being Taught How to Fight by a Delinquent Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 放課後はケンカ最強のギャルに連れこまれる生活　彼女たちに好かれて、僕も最強に⁉

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

description.en:
As a result of a combination of his good-natured personality and bad luck, Shiki Orifushi ends up enrolling in St. Lukeman's Academy, a school renowned for its delinquent students.

Before entering the school, Shiki had lived a life far removed from being a delinquent, but at St. Lukeman's, he was an herbivore thrown into a predator's cage.
Shiki was well aware of his situation, but his sense of justice and good-natured personality make him catch the attention of one of the school's numerous gangs of delinquents.

For the next year, Shiki was bullied by the delinquents and lived through hellish days, but one day, he almost bumped into the school's strongest delinquent gal, Karin Kohinata, in front of a vending machine. As a result of this, Shiki's school life changes completely.

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel Raw](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330648656085875)
description.ja:
**ジャンルに「学園」がない不具合**

お人好しな性格と不運が重なった結果、折節史季（おりふし　しき）は不良校として名高い聖ルキマンツ学園に入学するハメになってしまう。

学園に入学する以前は不良とは縁遠い生活を送っていた史季は、聖ルキマンツ学園においては肉食動物の檻に放り込まれた草食動物そのもの。
史季自身もそのことは重々に承知していたが、そこそこの正義感とそこそこ以上にお人好しな性格が災いとなり、校内に掃いて捨てるほどいる不良グループの一つに目をつけられてしまう。

それから一年もの間、史季は不良グループにいじめられ、地獄のような日々を送っていたが、ある日、学園最強のヤンキーギャル――小日向夏凛（こひなた　かりん）と自販機前でぶつかりそうになったことを契機に、史季の学園生活は一変することとなる。

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.

title.en: The Cool Girl Acts like a Cat Only for Me

altTitles.ja: クールな彼女は俺にだけねこちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool na Kanojo wa ore ni Dake Neko-chan

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||

altTitles.ja: 致命的な結婚

description.en: The highly popular Korean novel is finally getting a long-awaited comic adaptation! Yuri, a serious and ordinary college student, suddenly finds herself noticed by the heir of a major conglomerate and begins living a life where she is referred to as "Madam"…!? At first, Yuri is afraid of his cold demeanor, but gradually she begins to see various sides of him…? Yuri's exciting and new daily life is about to unfold now!

title.en: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: Oreyome
Kono Naka ni 1-ri, Ore no Yome ga Iru
この中に1人、俺の嫁がいる

altTitles.en: One of them is my wife

altTitles.id: Salah Satu Dari Mereka Adalah Istriku

description.en:
For the sake of finding clues about his younger twin brother who suddenly went missing, the protagonist changed his identity and infiltrated the academy his brother was attending.

However, what clearly came to light there was a surprising truth! His brother had multiple fiancées...?

(Source: Ganma)
description.id: Souya seorang laki-laki yang menggantikan posisi adiknya yang tiba-tiba menghilang, Terlebih lagi dia menemukan fakta yang mengejutkan bahwa adiknya memiliki banyak tunangan?
description.ja: 突如失踪した双子の弟の手がかりを得る為、入れ替わって学園に潜入することになった主人公。 しかし、そこで明らかになるのは驚愕の事実！ 弟には複数人の婚約者が居て……？

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

altTitles.ja: 狛田さんを困らせたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 想讓狛田前輩感到為難

description.en: Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior, Kagai, who is big in various ways, is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However, there is a reason why Kagai annoys her, and that is simply because... The more you love someone, the more you want to annoy them!

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

altTitles.ja: クレイジーフードトラック

description.en:
Gordon is an unsociable middle-aged man driving his food truck through a world buried in sand. 
One day, he meets a girl named Arisa sleeping stark naked in the middle of the desert. 
While Arisa wolfs down any and all food she can fit in her mouth, 
a mysterious armed group seems to be pursuing her, too.
description.id: Gordon adalah seorang pria paruh baya yang tidak ramah, mengemudikan truk makanannya melalui dunia yang terkubur dalam pasir. Suatu hari, ia bertemu dengan seorang gadis bernama Arisa yang tidur telanjang bulat di tengah gurun. Sementara Arisa melahap semua makanan yang bisa dia muat di mulutnya, sekelompok bersenjata misterius tampaknya juga mengejarnya.
description.ru:
Гордон - нелюдимый мужчина средних лет, разъезжающий на своём грузовике с едой по миру песка. 
Однажды он встречает девушку по имени Алиса, спящую голышом посреди пустыни. Пока Алиса съедает любую еду, которая может поместиться во рту, таинственная вооруженная группа, 
похоже, тоже преследует ее.

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック

description.en:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
description.th: อันเดดที่ใฝ่หาความตายปรากฎตัวขึ้นต่อหน้าอันลัคที่ตั้งใจจะตาย...!? ฮีโร่วายร้ายที่ทั้งร้าย！โหด! โป๊! แบบที่คุณไม่เคยเห็นมาก่อน ตีพิมพ์แล้วในจัมป์วันนี้!
